Package com.cedro.musicplayer

Class Jukebox

java.lang.Object
com.cedro.musicplayer.Jukebox
public class Jukebox extends Object
Singleton class responsible for playing and keeping track of the state of currenty played music. Also stores a MusicDatabase object.

      Return whether any music is currently playing
      Returns:
      boolean - true if music is playing, false otherwise

      public boolean isPaused()
      Return whether any music is currently paused
      Returns:
      boolean - true if music is paused, false otherwise

    • selectTrack

      public void selectTrack(int newIndex, boolean shouldPlay)
      Select and prepare a track from a given index in the playlist
      Parameters:
      newIndex - - index of the track to be selected
      shouldPlay - - whether the track should be played after it is selected and ready

    • selectTrack

      public void selectTrack(int newIndex)
      Select and prepare a track from a given index in the playlist. It will automatically play the track if any track was being played beforehand.
      Parameters:
      newIndex - - index of the track to be selected

    • play

      public void play()
      Resume playing the music if it's selected

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pause playing the music if it's being played

      Go to a given time point in the current music track
      Parameters:
      seekTime - - time point to go to

    • selectNextTrack

      public void selectNextTrack()
      Select the next available track in the playlist if possible

      public void selectPreviousTrack()
      Select the previous available track in the playlist if possible

      Get the current time point in the current track

    • setVolume

      public void setVolume(float volume)
      Set the music volume
      Parameters:
      volume - - volume to set between 0 and 1

    • onTrackReady

      private void onTrackReady(int index, javafx.scene.media.Media media, boolean wasPlayingBefore)
      Method called when it is prepared after selecting it. Sets up all the properties of the current track.
      Parameters:
      index - - index of the track
      media - - media object for that music track
      wasPlayingBefore - - if the music was playing before it was selected

    • onTrackFinished

      private void onTrackFinished()
      Method called when the current track finishes playing. Selects the next track in the playlist if it's looping.
